name: The Button (itch) (Monotub Studios)
description:
Left or Right click - Reverse shield rotation

Hold Left Click - Expand shields

Hold Right Click - Shrink shields

This is my first real Unity project. Made in Unity 2021.3

I noticed some of the enemy death shaders aren't showing up correctly in these builds and that the button sometimes sticks. I'll get those sorted out soon!

Hopefully you enjoy what I have so far!
